description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard for e-commerce data lakehouse

charts.name: Daily Revenue Trend
charts.sql: SELECT sale_date, sum(total_revenue) AS revenue FROM lakehouse.daily_sales GROUP BY sale_date ORDER BY sale_date

charts.name: Revenue by Category
charts.sql: SELECT category_level1, sum(total_revenue) AS revenue FROM lakehouse.daily_sales GROUP BY category_level1

charts.name: Conversion Funnel
charts.sql: SELECT 'Views' AS stage, sum(views) AS count FROM lakehouse.funnel_analysis UNION ALL SELECT 'Carts', sum(carts) FROM lakehouse.funnel_analysis UNION ALL SELECT 'Purchases', sum(purchases) FROM lakehouse.funnel_analysis

charts.name: Customer Segments
charts.sql: SELECT customer_segment, count() AS customers FROM lakehouse.customer_rfm GROUP BY customer_segment ORDER BY customers DESC

charts.name: Top 10 Products
charts.sql: SELECT product_id, brand, category_level1, total_revenue, purchases FROM lakehouse.product_performance ORDER BY revenue_rank LIMIT 10
